# cook your code here
T=int(raw_input())
while T>0:
    T-=1
    N=int(raw_input())
    s=[int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
    s=sorted(s)
    L=[]
    i=0
    while i < N:
        if i%2 ==0:
            L.append(s[i])
            i+=1
        elif(i+1 < N):
            L.append(s[i+1])
            L.append(s[i])
            i+=2
        else:
            L.append(s[i])
            i+=1
    for i in range(N-1):
        print L[i],
    print L[N-1]
